name: Miami crime simulator
description:
* A large variety of deadly weapons and ammo!
* Car theft!
The rivalry between criminals and police takes a new twist. In Miami a villain appeared and even the police can not win him. You can be reincarnated as the king of the gangland. Bring down all their forces on the police and find out all the secrets of evil deeds - is your major goal! Feel yourself as a very violent criminal!

Known bugs fixed (thanks for our players for the feedback!)
New:

Destroyable car and bike models with updated in-game physics for more realistic gameplay;
Full functional combat tank model with rotating gun tower and devastating firepower;
Updated helicopter model with simplified controls and improved machineguns onboard;
Now you can find even a ship in-game!
Reworked aim system, giving the player ability to shoot precise in-battle with all weapon types;
Added new animations, new special effects(blood spill, collision sparks, etc.), new sound effects(collision, shooting, explosions, tank, helicopter and bike sounds);
Reworked and supplemented quest system for more enthralling gameplay;
Game moved on new bigger diverse location;
Code optimized for better fps results.
